name: Amazing Dragon
description:
••• An Amazing Adventure that will Enchanted you! •••

Sweepy, the little Dragon, is now alone.
He needs your help to pass across the sky without falling.
During 10 levels, the difficulty increases and Sweepy doesn't fly very well.
So, he should be more careful not to fall.

Share your score online and try to stay in the world ranking.
The flag of your country will appear on the international scores table.

••• Game Features •••

• Meet Sweepy the little Dragon
• Sweepy is very endearing
• Full 3D Real Time rendering
• 10 different levels
• Upload your Score and enter in the World Ranking
